title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 326, subpt. 326-2 - Procedure Governing Appeals And Reviews Before The Medical Appeals Unit
content:

§ 326-2.3 - Content of notice of appeal

§ 326-2.6 - Notice of oral argument, additional testimony
§ 326-2.7 - Hearing of oral argument, additional testimony

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. C, pt. 326, subpt. 326-2

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13[a], [h][3], 117, 141

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
